title: Built for AI-first Search
description: Kasparro is designed from the ground up for how modern AI systems understand, trust, and cite brands — not for traditional ranking algorithms.

principles.title: System-first Thinking
principles.text: We model AI perception as a pipeline of structured signals instead of isolated metrics.

principles.title: Context Over Keywords
principles.text: AI systems reason over entities, relationships, and authority — not keyword density.

principles.title: Explainable Audits
principles.text: Every score is backed by clear signals, issues, and recommendations.
